data.eml:eml: Three new species of the genus Thrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) in Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Masumoto, Masami, Okajima, Shûji (2019): Three new species of the genus Thrips (Thysanoptera, Thripidae) in Japan. Zootaxa 4614 (3): 575-584, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4614.3.9
